title: How to Play House With Teddy Bears

steps.headline: If you're going to be a mom/dad, then you obviously need a job.
steps.description: Figure out something you want to be beforehand, such as a nurse, an actor, a gardener, etc. Use your imagination!

steps.headline: Make all your teddy bears or stuffed animals your kids.
steps.description: Sons, daughters, babies, teenagers... Anything you want!

steps.headline: Decide where you're going to live in.
steps.description: It can be a mansion, an apartment, a cottage, a house, a treehouse, an igloo, etc. Anything, really!

steps.headline: Pretend you're going to work.
steps.description: After work pick up your kids from school.

steps.headline: Cook a meal for your family.
steps.description: You can buy play-dough and make them food with that.

steps.headline: Tuck them in bed and start the whole day over.
Have fun with your kids, on the weekend take them to the park, push them on the swings and play hide and seek with them.
If one of your teddy bears or stuffed animals happen to be a baby, include the activities of bottle-feeding, walks, naps, and diaper changing time.
Care as if your kids were real.
steps.description: If they're sick, take them to the doctors. Take them to the barber shop and get a haircut (wouldn't really recommend unless you want a bald teddy bear or stuffed animal.)

steps.headline: Pretend that your teddy bears or stuffed animals are your friends at work and you are their boss.
Pretend to go on vacation with your teddy bears or stuffed animals to anywhere you like.
Pretend to be driving you car with your children and wife/husband, your teddy bears or stuffed animals.
Pretend that the teddy bears or stuffed animals are pilots, fishermen/women, gardeners, astronauts or whatever the teddy bears or stuffed animals want to be.
Pretend your son/daughter goes to university.
Pretend that you start as a small baby and your teddy bears or stuffed animals are you parents and they feed you and change your diaper etc.
steps.description: Also when you get older you go to school and graduate and then get married and you go to university and you get a job like gardener, astronaut, scientist, doctor or whatever you want to be.

text: If you're going to be a mom/dad, then you obviously need a job. Figure out something you want to be beforehand, such as a nurse, an actor, a gardener, etc. Use your imagination! Make all your teddy bears or stuffed animals your kids. Sons, daughters, babies, teenagers... Anything you want! Decide where you're going to live in. It can be a mansion, an apartment, a cottage, a house, a treehouse, an igloo, etc. Anything, really! Pretend you're going to work. After work pick up your kids from school. Cook a meal for your family. You can buy play-dough and make them food with that. Tuck them in bed and start the whole day over.  Have fun with your kids, on the weekend take them to the park, push them on the swings and play hide and seek with them.  If one of your teddy bears or stuffed animals happen to be a baby, include the activities of bottle-feeding, walks, naps, and diaper changing time.  Care as if your kids were real. If they're sick, take them to the doctors. Take them to the barber shop and get a haircut (wouldn't really recommend unless you want a bald teddy bear or stuffed animal.) Pretend that your teddy bears or stuffed animals are your friends at work and you are their boss. Give them paperwork to do. Pretend to go on vacation with your teddy bears or stuffed animals to anywhere you like.  Pretend to be driving you car with your children and wife/husband, your teddy bears or stuffed animals.  Pretend that the teddy bears or stuffed animals are pilots, fishermen/women, gardeners, astronauts or whatever the teddy bears or stuffed animals want to be.  Pretend your son/daughter finishes school.  Pretend you son/daughter gets married.  Pretend your son/daughter goes to university.  Pretend that you start as a small baby and your teddy bears or stuffed animals are you parents and they feed you and change your diaper etc. Also when you get older you go to school and graduate and then get married and you go to university and you get a job like gardener, astronaut, scientist, doctor or whatever you want to be.
